recipe.title: Strawberry Citrus Salad
ingredients: 3 cups sliced hulled strawberries (about one 22-ounce basket)
3 large navel oranges, peeled, thickly sliced crosswise, cut into 3/4-inch pieces (about 3 cups)
2 tablespoons thinly sliced fresh mint leaves
instructions: Toss all ingredients in large bowl. Let stand at room temperature 30 minutes.
